reviewText: Thank you for having this video. It arrived on time and in good shape. Keep up the good work. Thanks again.

Shannon Whirry and her fantastic body is what makes this movie interesting.  Also the other plot areas such as threesomes and voyeuristic husband lend a bit of humor to this erotic film. I've watched the video over and over again and was looking to add the DVD to my collection. The inflated price for some may be worth it but I will wait on the sidelines for a more expanded release and hopefully lower price.

Shannon Whirry makes the erotic thriller genre all hers with her incredibly hot performance as Joanne Cole, a housewife with some naughty hobbies.  She plays while hubby watches.  The plot is OK and the acting by  the rest of the cast is better than she usually gets to work with.  This  DVD looks really good but I'm not giving up my VHS copy of the unrated  version.  If they release that very hot version on DVD buy it.  I will.  Shannon Whirry may not give her best or most sensual performance in this  movie but she blasts all the pretenders off the screen.  Her physical  attributes and sensuality combine with a real wholesomeness that comes  through with enough truth to steal your heart.
